match.title: 2nd ODI
match.statusText: Pakistan won by 7 wickets (with 10 balls remaining) (D/L method)

image.caption: A general view of the Iqbal Stadium in Faisalabad
image.longCaption: A general view of the Iqbal Stadium in Faisalabad, Pakistan v England, 2nd Test, Faisalabad, November 21, 2005

match.hoursInfo: 15.00 start, First Session 15.00-18.30 Interval 18.30-19.15, Second Session 19.15-22.45

dismissalText.long: c Umar Gul b Shahid Afridi
dismissalText.commentary: Tamim Iqbal c Umar Gul b Shahid Afridi 60 (78b 10x4 0x6 114m) SR: 76.92

dismissalComment.html: caught! Tosses it up and Tamim comes down the wicket and mishits it in the air down the ground to long off, Umar Gul takes a good catch above his head. An unnecessary shot by Tamim, who was striking the ball well.

headshotImage.longCaption: Shakib Al Hasan headshot

dismissalComment.html: Afridi strikes, pitches in line with the stumps and Shakib Al Hassan plays across the line and misses, the ball strikes the pad, loud appeal, Bucknor takes his time and raises his finger.

headshotImage.caption: Tamim Iqbal headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: Tamim Iqbal headshot

dismissalComment.html: caught! Tosses it up and Tamim comes down the wicket and mishits it in the air down the ground to long off, Umar Gul takes a good catch above his head. An unnecessary shot by Tamim, who was striking the ball well.

headshotImage.caption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: Afridi strikes just after the drinks break, quicker delivery strikes the pad in line as Reza plays forward, Bucknor ponders hard, nodes his head and then raises his finger. Afridi picks up his third wicket.

headshotImage.caption: Sohail Tanvir player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: caught! First strike for Tanvir and Pakistan, action replay to the first ODI, when he got out. It was wide outside the off stump and Nafees cuts, gets the edge through to Akmal behind the stumps.

headshotImage.caption: Mashrafe Mortaza headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: Mashrafe Mortaza headshot

dismissalComment.html: super delivery, full and right in the block-hole, Mortaza makes room and looks to play through the off side, misses it and the ball knocks the base of the off stump.

dismissalText.commentary: Salman Butt run out (Mohammad Ashraful) 76 (72b 9x4 1x6 99m) SR: 105.55

dismissalComment.html: run out! Fuller delivery driven to cover, Ashraful makes a good diving stop, both the batsmen are in the middle of the pitch, Ashraful picks up the ball and scores a direct hit to run out Butt.

commentTextItems.html: That's it Pakistan win. Razzak fires one down the leg side and Dhiman Ghosh cannot collect it, goes to the fence, signaled wides.

commentPostTextItems.html: Pakistan win by 7 wickets (D/L method) and lead the series 2-0. Another very comfortable win for Pakistan set up equally by the bowlers and Salman Butt's fifty (Man-of-the-Match). Rain threatened to give them a tough target, but Butt made light work of Bangladesh's bowling. The Faisalabad crowd, as ever, remained undeterred by the rain ensuring Pakistan got home in a festive atmosphere.

commentTextItems.html: quicker delivery pushed to cover.
pushed to the off side.
Malik gets off the mark in style, cuts hard behind point to the fence.

dismissalText.commentary: Salman Butt run out (Mohammad Ashraful) 76 (72b 9x4 1x6 99m) SR: 105.55

commentTextItems.html: run out! Fuller delivery driven to cover, Ashraful makes a good diving stop, both the batsmen are in the middle of the pitch, Ashraful picks up the ball and scores a direct hit to run out Butt.
comes forward and defends back to the bowler.
lovely shot from Butt, drives it well through midwicket to the fence.
opens the face off the bat and plays to thirdman.
pushed to cover.
sweeps it well down to fine leg fence.

headshotImage.caption: Aftab Ahmed player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Aftab Ahmed player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: Gul strikes, pitches short of a length and coming in, strikes the pad bit high as Aftab comes forward, loud appeal and umpire Dar raises his finger. Aftab might be unlucky as the ball hit him bit high on the pad.

headshotImage.caption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: caught! First strike for Tanvir and Pakistan, action replay to the first ODI, when he got out. It was wide outside the off stump and Nafees cuts, gets the edge through to Akmal behind the stumps.

headshotImage.caption: Mashrafe Mortaza headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: Mashrafe Mortaza headshot

dismissalComment.html: super delivery, full and right in the block-hole, Mortaza makes room and looks to play through the off side, misses it and the ball knocks the base of the off stump.

dismissalComment.html: good length delivery coming in and strikes the pad in line as Ashraful plays forward, a loud appeal and Dar raises his finger. Iftikhar picks up Ashraful.

short ball and Dhiman Ghosh mishits it high in the air and down the ground to long on, Nasir Jamshed runs forward and the ball pops out on the first attempt and then he reacts well to take it on the second attempt.

headshotImage.longCaption: Shakib Al Hasan headshot

dismissalComment.html: Afridi strikes, pitches in line with the stumps and Shakib Al Hassan plays across the line and misses, the ball strikes the pad, loud appeal, Bucknor takes his time and raises his finger.

headshotImage.caption: Tamim Iqbal headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: Tamim Iqbal headshot

dismissalComment.html: caught! Tosses it up and Tamim comes down the wicket and mishits it in the air down the ground to long off, Umar Gul takes a good catch above his head. An unnecessary shot by Tamim, who was striking the ball well.

headshotImage.caption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Farhad Reza player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: Afridi strikes just after the drinks break, quicker delivery strikes the pad in line as Reza plays forward, Bucknor ponders hard, nodes his head and then raises his finger. Afridi picks up his third wicket.

dismissalText.commentary: Salman Butt run out (Mohammad Ashraful) 76 (72b 9x4 1x6 99m) SR: 105.55

notes: Bangladesh innings
Power Play 2: Overs 10.1 - 15.0
Bangladesh: 50 runs in 10.4 overs (70 balls), Extras 6
Drinks: Bangladesh - 63/2 in 14.0 overs (Tamim Iqbal 30, Mohammad Ashraful 21)
Power Play 3: Overs 15.1 - 20.0
Tamim Iqbal: 50 off 69 balls (9 x 4)
Bangladesh: 100 runs in 23.0 overs (147 balls), Extras 9
Drinks: Bangladesh - 141/5 in 33.0 overs (Mahmudullah 14, Farhad Reza 26)
Bangladesh: 150 runs in 35.5 overs (227 balls), Extras 16
7th Wicket: 50 runs in 62 balls (Mahmudullah 21, Dhiman Ghosh 20, Ex 9)
Bangladesh: 200 runs in 44.6 overs (284 balls), Extras 19
Mahmudullah: 50 off 67 balls (5 x 4)
Rain: Bangladesh - 225/8 in 48.2 overs (Mahmudullah 58, Abdur Razzak 1)
Pakistan innings
Pakistan: 50 runs in 8.3 overs (51 balls), Extras 4
Wet Ground: Pakistan - 0/0
Pakistan: 100 runs in 15.4 overs (95 balls), Extras 8
Salman Butt: 50 off 49 balls (6 x 4)
3rd Wicket: 50 runs in 39 balls (Salman Butt 18, Mohammad Yousuf 29, Ex 3)
Pakistan: 150 runs in 22.3 overs (136 balls), Extras 9

milestones.description: Ashraful has become the top scorer for BAN in ODIs with 2188 runs, going past Habibul Bashar's 2168

stories.title: Reality bites
stories.subTitle: Pakistan v Bangladesh, 2nd ODI, Faisalabad
stories.summary: It probably helps if you are coaching Bangladesh to be both grimly realistic and cautiously optimistic. Luckily for Bangladesh, Jamie Siddons is able to do both
stories.byline: Osman Samiuddin at the Iqbal Stadium

stories.title: Pakistan v Bangladesh, 2nd ODI, Faisalabad
stories.subTitle: April 11, 2008
stories.summary: Match home for the second ODI between Pakistan and Bangladesh in Faisalabad

stories.title: Aggressive Butt scripts seven-wicket win
stories.subTitle: Pakistan v Bangladesh, 2nd ODI, Faisalabad
stories.summary: A blazing 76 by Salman Butt led Pakistan to a comprehensive seven-wicket win in a rain-curtailed match at the Iqbal Stadium

galleries.title: Butt powers Pakistan to seven-wicket win
